column5: In the last few decades, companies have accumulated overhelming amounts of data. Using statistical data mining methods, one can detect tendencies, hidden patterns and knowledge nuggets, and use them to make strategic decisions. This process is of crucial importance in all sectors of activity, and in particular for business, politics, security, healthcare, etc.This MSc program is aimed at future experts in the design of high-performance support systems for data mining, knowledge extraction and decision aiding.Check out the MSc leaflet !ContentThe program includes 3 academic semesters on IMT Atlantique Nantes campus + 6-month paid internship in a company or lab.Year
